articles.title: Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about this week’s weather, including Tuesday’s snow
articles.description:
"Snow breaks out late tomorrow afternoon, steadiest in the evening."

summary: Snow expected to start late Tuesday afternoon, peaking in the evening.
Meteorologists predict significant accumulation, impacting evening commutes for Boston residents.
Residents should prepare for possible travel disruptions and hazardous road conditions.

articles.title: 7 days, no suspects: The disappearance of Nancy Guthrie
articles.description:
The search for Nancy Guthrie has become a sensation, fueled by her daughter Savannah Guthrie’s fame as a "Today" show anchor and the many questions that remain.

The post 7 days, no suspects: The disappearance of Nancy Guthrie appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nancy Guthrie has been missing for 7 days, raising concerns in the community.
Her daughter, Savannah Guthrie, is a well-known anchor on the 'Today' show.
The case has intensified local discussions about safety and missing persons in Boston.

articles.title: Should you be worried about your roof this winter?
articles.description:
Roofing experts break down what homeowners should be paying attention to as the snow and cold persists.

The post Should you be worried about your roof this winter? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Homeowners should inspect roofs for damage due to heavy snow and ice this winter.
Experts recommend clearing snow from roofs to prevent ice dams and structural issues.
Neglecting roof maintenance could lead to costly repairs for Boston residents this spring.

articles.title: 4 maps predicting Tuesday snowfall totals
articles.description:
"Most of this next snow will fall Tuesday late afternoon, evening & night."

summary: Snowfall expected in Boston Tuesday afternoon through night.

Residents advised to prepare for hazardous travel conditions.

articles.title: US Olympians speaking up about politics at home face online backlash — including from Trump
articles.description:
When asked at a news conference how they feel representing the U.S. during the Trump administration’s heightened immigration enforcement, several athletes said their emotions are mixed.

The post US Olympians speaking up about politics at home face online backlash — including from Trump appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: US Olympians express mixed feelings about representing the country amid Trump's immigration policies.
Athletes face significant online backlash, including criticism from former President Trump.
Local Boston residents may feel divided on athletes' political statements during international competitions.

articles.title: The Patriots defense was very good, even sensational at times, but couldn’t force that needed big mistake
articles.description:
The defense didn’t lose this game, by any means. The problem, the lament, is that the Patriots needed them to win it.

The post The Patriots defense was very good, even sensational at times, but couldn’t force that needed big mistake appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots defense performed well but failed to create crucial turnovers during the game.
Despite strong performance, the defense couldn't secure a win for the Patriots on February 9.
Boston residents are concerned about the team's inability to capitalize on defensive strengths.

articles.title: The child in Bad Bunny’s halftime show was an actor
articles.description:
There was much speculation about the boy’s identity. The young actor posted on social media about his experience as part of Bad Bunny’s performance.

The post The child in Bad Bunny’s halftime show was an actor appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bad Bunny's halftime show featured a young actor, not a random child.
The actor shared his experience on social media after the performance.
This revelation clarifies speculation and highlights local talent in entertainment.

articles.title: ‘I just feel numb’: Inside the Patriots’ locker room after a crushing Super Bowl defeat
articles.description:
"Kudos to them, they made more plays than us, but I feel sick, bro."

The post ‘I just feel numb’: Inside the Patriots’ locker room after a crushing Super Bowl defeat appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots players expressed deep disappointment after losing Super Bowl LX to the Seahawks.
Quarterback expressed feeling 'sick' about the defeat, highlighting emotional toll on the team.
Local fans share in the team's pain, affecting community morale and support for the Patriots.

articles.title: A 1788 Rhode Island home that houses the ‘oldest gingerbread ovens in America’ for $754k
articles.description:
In the basement, Stephen “Baker” Greene created his beloved gingerbread that, in the 1800s, earned him acclaim throughout South County, Rhode Island.

The post A 1788 Rhode Island home that houses the ‘oldest gingerbread ovens in America’ for $754k appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Historic 1788 Rhode Island home listed for $754k features oldest gingerbread ovens in America.
Stephen 'Baker' Greene's gingerbread gained acclaim in the 1800s, impacting local culinary history.
Potential buyers could preserve a unique piece of regional heritage for Boston residents.
